name: SetSnowRectangle
documentation:
Sets snowfall in the given area with the given strength.

*Note*: The points can be given in any order.

*Note*: Points must have valid coordinates (inside the map).

*Note*: If defined here, cannot be controlled by missions.

*See*: [German tutorial](https://www.wikinger-tommy.de/download/intern/wettererscheinungen.pdf)

parameters.name: Strength
parameters.documentation: The higher the stronger the weather effect. Ranges from 100 (light) to 5000 (heavy).
